question: Which one of the following native states was NOT annexed by the British on the basis of the Doctrine of Lapse?
explanation: Doctrine of Lapse was the formula devised by Lord Dalhousie to deal with questions of succession and annex the territories. Under this doctrine, Satara was annexed in 1848; Sambalpur was annexed in 1849; Karauli was annexed in 1852 and Jhansi was annexed in 1854.
